website_summaries.verdict: There's a definite learning curve with this wand, but it will leave you with natural curls and beachy waves.
pros: This wand heats up quickly and works on thick hair, and it includes a cloth glove to protect your hands
cons: There's a learning curve if you're used to an iron with a clip, but once you learn, you'll finish your hair more quickly

website_summaries.verdict: For a small amount of money, you get an amazing tool. The highest quality for the least amount of money.
pros: A clamp-less, conical wand with a great reputation for beautiful results
cons: Learning to use a clamp-less wand can be a challenge, but Internet tutorials are available

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A wand that works!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a wand successfully work until this one. I recently got the cool girl haircut (medium lob) and this wand is an essential!! It smooths my hair as well. No frizz and lasting waves!! Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This curling wand is awesome! I will say that it doesn't keep tight curls long but it will keep the hair wavy! I am going on three days of sleeping on my curls and they still look great! I like big wavy curls so it does the trick for me and was worried about finding something that would keep my curls! Pictures show day one!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this thing is seriously amazing! I bought the smaller barrel (1/2-1inch) and can't believe how easy it was to curl my hair! I have very frizzy curly hair and wanted something to smooth out the frizz while making my curls a little looser and polished looking, and this wand nailed it! Super easy to use with a little practice. Watch a lot of YouTube videos for tips and tricks. I'm in love! Side note, I was raised by boys so I am just now (in my 30's) figuring out how to be a girl, so I am very much a novice at styling my hair so if I can figure it out, anyone can!
customer_reviews.author: MamaMcGeez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have SUPER thick hair and a lot of it! Everytime I curl my hair my arm gets a workout sitting there for minutes just to make sure my hair curls. This thing is a BEAST and does it quickly. I don't have to do super tiny sections just to get it all curled which takes FOREVER. Great beach waves. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Wand!
customer_reviews.text: My first one stopped turning on after 3 years so I repurchased it, and I cannot recommend it enough! The wand gives you beautiful beachy waves that look natural. I have tried high end (like Sultra) wands to no avail. It's VERY easy to use, and now that I do this all the time it takes me about 20 minutes to curl all of my hair- and I have very long hair. The attached picture (it only loads sideways) is after 3 hours, and the curls are still holding up. Just remember that if you have really long hair like I do, you will not be able to get too much volume since your hair weighs the curls down.
customer_reviews.author: KLL

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage... If I could’ve given zero stars I would have. I bought this for a Christmas gift for my daughter and it went back immediately. I don’t know how they could’ve made it any cheaper than they did but I’m sure that if I would’ve kept it it would’ve fallen apart within a week not to mention did not heat up as advertised. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Just a girl from PNW

customer_reviews.title: Will get the job done ✔
customer_reviews.text: Okay, for me there's a bit of a learning curve. It's hard to curl one side of my hair while holding this iron downward. However, I dare say my hair holds the curl better with this iron than any traditional one, and my fine hair does not hold curl! Still working on what temp serves me best. The "stand" on the iron is a bit annoying, cause my shoulder length hair tends to wrap up above it, so not all my hair is on the iron. I'm working through it, lol. Anyway, for $20 I think this is a really good iron.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Not the curling wand for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Babyliss curling wand that I’ve used for 4+ years. I wanted something a little bigger but didn’t want to spend a lot. I have been looking at this curling wand for over a month. I finally gave in and bought it. I couldn’t wait to use it. I turned it on and set it to medium heat. I curled a couple of pieces and by the time I got to the other side of my head the curls weren’t holding. So I turned the heat up as high as it would go. It took me two hours to curl my hair. I kept going back over piece after piece because it just wouldn’t hold the curl.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect curling wand!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Remington wand! It is very easy to use and curls quickly. I have very straight hair and it works great for me! I would definitely recommend!! (My picture was taken at the end of the day and the curls still look pretty good!)
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This wand helped hold waves in my super straight hair. I have long, fine hair and normally I end up with super tight ringlets if I use a 1/2 inch iron, or hair straighter than when I started within an hour if I use any larger of a barrel. This wand created nice loose waves that held for a full day! I'm very impressed. It was a little tricky to get the hang of after only using a regular curling iron that lets you clip in the har before, especially since my hair is so long, but figuring out how to make it work was well worth it for the results!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great if you know how to use it. Does get hot but the glove works! It takes some practice but really can achieve great waves and curls with practice. My hair never holds curl. This is my miracle product
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DeGroff

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: This works no better than anything else. I actually get a better curl with my Conair straightener. I just use it like a curling iron and voila! This is awkward to use and being that there is nothing to hold your hair in place (other than your gloved hand) is a little ridiculous. Sorry, mine is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Best curls in Boston
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this curling wand. It heats up SO quickly that it makes getting ready so much easier because I'm not sitting around waiting for it to heat up. It works really great and I love the temperature options. Also, it's nice that when I'm holding it curling my hair and I accidentally hit the buttons it doesn't really affect anything. The button may push down like I pushed it, but nothing changes.. You have to hold the power button to turn it on or off. Similarly, I've noticed with the temperature change buttons you have to hit them twice to get the temp. to go up or down which is a great feature I didn't think I needed.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing! My daughter has very fine hair that never ...
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! My daughter has very fine hair that never holds curl, but with this wand a little hairspray it was like a curl miracle! The curls stayed all day, even with her running around and dancing like a crazy woman....And for under $20!!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Trowbridge

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot near top of grip
customer_reviews.text: This product works well. I bought it to replace an old Remington wand I had that finally broke after 4 years. The only thing I don't like and my reason for 4 stars is that on the upper part of the handle near the base of the heated part it gets very hot after about a half hour. Can be uncomfortable to use because I don't feel like I can touch that part for more than a few seconds. If you hold onto it by the lower part of the handle it's not an issue but it still shouldn't get hot like that.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren12345

customer_reviews.title: I hate heating wands
customer_reviews.text: I just hate heating wands. Even after watching youtube videos I still don't like the results. I much prefer curling irons. This wand works for anyone who enjoys using them. If you are unsure then go with whatever hair appliance you have used in the past efficiently. If you are like me and don't like wands but can't seem to find the right sized curling iron (guess they are becoming the next dinosaurs)... then just keep searching for that curling iron. A wand won't replace a curling iron for me not even one with these many positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: ClassyCurly

customer_reviews.title: Curls didn't hold
customer_reviews.text: It heats up quickly and is relatively easy to use after some practice. I have natural waves and I do not have thick hair. My issue with this curler is the curls wouldn't hold at all. I had to use a lot of products in my hair to make it hold. It may be because my hair is very fine, so if you have fine hair, I would not recommend you buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Canchani

customer_reviews.title: Read ERROR 95% of the time and did not work properly
customer_reviews.text: This product is poorly made and repeatedly read ERROR after being turned on for just a few minutes. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: hw

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Curls last for days. Super lightweight so easy for travel. I'll admit, my go-to is the (much heavier) "Paul Mitchell Pro Tools Express Ion Unclipped 3-in-1 Curling Iron" because I'd say its curls stay tighter as the days go by. BUT the difference isn't significant enough for me to tell you to pay $70 more for Pro Tools. Remington still gave me curls that impressed my hairdresser. Also, if you're new to wands definitely watch YouTube tutorials. You won't need a glove after one or two tries.
customer_reviews.author: cat t

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! Scam
customer_reviews.text: DOESN’T WORK & NON RETURNABLE! First of all they shipped it via UPS with signature required, I wasn’t home so I didn’t get it until I had to go pick it up at a UPS 20 minutes from my house days later. That was inconvenient. Secondly, the wand sucks, I even put it on the highest heat level trying to get it to curl my hair and it still looked awful. (I’ve been using a curling wand for 10+ years!) obviously they know their product is a scam or else they would allow returns! Buyer be ware!
customer_reviews.author: amazon_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Hard to work with
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to use. My hair kept getting stuck in the black parts and it wouldn't get my whole hair strand because my hair is too long. It was very difficult trying to hold my hair to it while it curled because of the angle to curl my hair at and it kept twisting. I would not reccomend this one to anyone. Also it says auto shut off but doesn't say anywhere how long it shuts off after but that would suck if you were half way through and it shut off on you. It didnt have a timer or anything. Overall difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jacq diane

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Could not believe after 10 years of searching this last ditch wand had the magic to curl my hair in less than an hour. (My hair is nearly waist long, stick straight, and thin strands but TONS of it). I'm still learning so I imagine ill eventually get faster but this was awesome to finally have a heat tool worth using! Only complaint is that the barrel could be a little longer and the little stand for setting it on the counter often grabs my strands and it's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me and IS NON-RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick hair of medium coarseness. When I ordered this wand, I expected it to work like the Conair 1" to .5" wand that I have; I just wanted one to make larger waves. With that one, my hair instantly curls and stays curled for 24-48 hours. However, I had to try over and over to get my hair to curl with this one, even set on 410 degrees. I did like the way it looked, but the waves / curls immediately began to relax. It's non-returnable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful loose curls. Holds an entire day on my Asian hair
customer_reviews.text: This made my hair so gorgeous! But it took a bit of a learning curve w the glove and all. Use the glove. People burn themselves. I know bc I almost did and the women I watched on YouTube did too. This makes beautiful loose waves. It gets super hot. So make sure you get a heat protectant. Dried out my hair though. I have Asian hair. Only lasted one day. But that’s pretty good for me. Usually curl lasts less than a day.
customer_reviews.author: Smokeyeyepanda

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 minor complaint.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, if you can afford to splurge a little do that, I got mine on sale for 16 bucks and some change. Pros + Curls my hair (doesn't hold a curl usually) + Heats quickly +pretty color So far I've only used it once but instantly noticed something that caused me to take one star off my review, which is a small gap between the barrel and the handle (pictured) which catches just a couple strands of hair and causes breakage. Other than that little issue I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Notimpressed

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: The good news is that this arrived very quickly and it seems to be a well-made product. However, I am unhappy with the results when I use it. I don’t think it necessarily has to do with this brand of product, but more because I do not know how to properly use it on my hair. For those of you who have never used this type of a styling wand, it is not as easy as it looks! Try one out first, or have a friend show you how to use it properly, otherwise it will just sit in your bathroom and never get used.
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for Asian hair that is typically non-furlable
customer_reviews.text: For someone with long Asian hair, I have tried every curling iron and method possible and nothing has kept a curl. I almost gave up my dream of having nice waves until I saw the reviews on this product. It's my first venture into the world of curling wands and I am so glad I bought this tool. I use it throughout the week and the curls will last for days! Definitely watched a bunch a Youtube tutorial videos to make sure I was doing it correctly and voila..I end up with nice curls for day!
customer_reviews.author: MissM

customer_reviews.title: incredible product, I love it
customer_reviews.text: super easy to use, curled my little sister's hair yesterday and it turned out great! I love the bigger curls on me too because my hair is shorter. it works very well, just be careful!! not a product issue just an overall when using a curling iron make sure you use the glove included because especially the first few times you use it if you are used to having a clamp you might accidentally touch it or hold to close to your hand! again, no flaw in the product, just an overall precaution ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product because of all the positive reviews. It was a complete waste of money. My hair just looked frizzy after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Garpolian

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Works so good, I couldn't believe it. I have bought a few and spent alot of $ and non work like this one. I do my Daughter's hair with it every morning before school. Usually curls fall right out her hair but they stay in all day with this wand. And its so easy to use it takes me about 10 mins to do her whole head and thats because she has thick hair down to her butt. But only a couple minutes if i do bigger sections at one time.
customer_reviews.author: shane faulkner

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST CURLING WAND!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I’m really impressed with this curling wand! I’ve tried so many different brands and it never worked for me. I have a really thin hair that also has Brazilian blowout on it, which means it’s really hard for me to get my hair curly, but this curling wand does magic!!! I bought both sizes and the biggest one is my favorite because I like loose curls better, but both are amazing! It gets my hair curly and it also lasts for hours without setting spray, amazing! It’s pretty easy to use, it also comes with a glove, I totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stefani Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Easy, quick, frizz-free wavy curls!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! I have a lot of hair but it’s really flat and fine, so curling my hair takes forever and my hair is very stubborn at taking curls. It took me only 10 minutes to do my whole head! I love the wavy curls and the fact that there is no frizz. As noted in previous reviews, it takes a couple rounds to get used to it because there is no handle to hold the hair (it’s not a typical curling iron) but it’s totally worth it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: If this is really the best product on Amazon (as advertised) then Amazon customers need to raise their standards. I have several curling wands, and this one is super awkward. I burned myself several times ... never been an issue before. I’m not sure what it is ... I think the wand is shorter? I waited too long to return but wish I’d sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh if you are AA
customer_reviews.text: I have to hold hair in place using this wand for way longer than I deem as reasonable before frying it, before I see even half the curl I see on a lot of these review pics. With 410 degrees you should be able to get a decent curl within 10 seconds of application. It gives me extremely loose "partial waves" that fall within a couple of hours. That's not the look I'm trying to achieve. I hate that I threw away the packaging or I would have returned it. It's marginal at best, at least for this black woman's hair.
customer_reviews.author: H. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Ok it's a good product I like it but it is difficult to use at first. I do have it down better after 4 or 5 uses but your arms get tired(really tired). My hair is shoulder length and I should have gone with a smaller barrel size. I would buy again just smaller barrel. I think for me its more user issue lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about quality given the price but this is amazing! I’ve had it for a few years now and it still works just a well as when I first got it! Can’t tell you how many of my friends have bought this after using mine, and ditched their hot tools/ dry bar etc. The heat control is awesome and the tapered barrel creates natural looking waves. If you’ve not used a wand before, it takes a little getting used to, but you get the hang of it
customer_reviews.author: Elars

customer_reviews.title: fine but a lot of hair that will not curl
customer_reviews.text: I have straight, shoulder length, lightly layered, no color or damage, fine but a lot of hair that will not curl. I purchased this size as it was recommended through blogs and youtube videos for the perfect wave. I set it to ~400 degrees and it barely curled or waved my hair. I upped the heat to 410 and there was no difference. I came back and purchased the 1/2-1 inch wand and that size is so amazing on my hair. I would only recommend this size to those with hair past your underarms or if you have hair that accepts curls without issue.
customer_reviews.author: seymour5000

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: There is no clamp to hold hair on the wand, so hair slips off. Unless you are happy to use one hand to hold the wand and a gloved hand to hold a portion of hair on it long enough to curl, over and over for all of your hair, you will not like this item. And, it is not returnable to Amazon. If you buy it and you don't like it, you need to contact Amazon customer service to get an exchange or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Only five heat settings
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size barrel and the ceramic plates are great, but there are only about 5 different heat settings you can use. It has a digital display so you think you can change it all manually with the + and - buttons, but it just jumps in pre-set increments of ~20 degrees. I have to bounce between a ~320, ~350, ~375, and ~395... not a lot of flexibility, reminds me of using a chi. Otherwise handles beautifully and comes with a heat glove.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Good

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, affordable curling wand! My only complaint is that it takes about 5 minutes to heat up to it's highest temperature. I purchased this after using a flat iron to curl my hair for years and wanted a wand option for easy, everyday curls. I really LOVE this flat iron! It's easy to use and leaves me with soft, healthy curls. It doesn't leave my hair feeling fried like it did with the flat iron. The big barrel and almost no taper makes this great for casual curls!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke under 2 months with limited use
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, when I first received and used this wand I was ecstatic about the value for the price. I bought this in Feb, so it’s only been about 2 months and it has already stopped working. After plugging it in and pressing the power button, it doesn’t heat up and will read ERR after about 5 seconds. I have never dropped it and it hasn’t even been used that often. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: The only curling wand to work on my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what it is about the Remington Pearl Ceramic wands, but they are the ONLY wands to work and HOLD A CURL on my hair. Nothing else works as well, nor even comes close. Love this wand. It creates beautiful wavy curls! I have very long hair, the entire length of my back, and I can wrap my hair around this wand completely. Good length, good barrel width. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Beaupre

customer_reviews.title: 6 years and still amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I use mine since 2013 with no problem! You can have very well defined curls or medium size waves. I recommend watching a youtube video on how to use it. Once you get used to it, it's like using an electric tootbrush. I have used the wand for hair that's shoulder length and under breast length. It holds for a long time. If you use in a humid place I suggest to dry your hair first and use hairspray for each strand before you use the wand. Once done, you can split the strands for even more voluminous hair! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: bmho

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy :/
customer_reviews.text: I bought this curler because I know I love how well my hair holds a curl with the wand + this had relatively good reviews considering how cheap it is. I received the product and went to use it and it just straight up doesn't work. The little screen for the temperature did not show anything when plugged in and the curler only got slightly warm (still able to touch) even after 10 mins. I tried to return the product but for some reason it didn't let me even though it's only been 2 weeks. A waste of $20 :/
customer_reviews.author: E. Milewski

customer_reviews.title: Best curler!
customer_reviews.text: Literally my favorite way to style my hair now. It takes 5 minutes to do all of my long thick hair and it lasts days (Day 1 and Day 2 pictured). I split my hair in half and start curling one side in sections from the back to the front. Make sure you're curling away from your face- you'll need to hold the wand with your left hand to do the right side. I don't use the glove since I leave 1 inch out from the wand.
customer_reviews.author: gatorgirl151688

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I've been looking for. It gives me large, beachy waves with minimal effort. I have fine hair that is actually loosely permed, but it's growing out and I'm trying to buy time before going back to the salon. So I bought this to re-create my permed look, and it's perfect! I just do about 8 sections and I'm done in less than 5 minutes! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: oc

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Item came well packaged and nothing was missing. It heats up quickly and does the job very well. I have been using it for a good while now and it's still works perfectly fine. You can create some beautiful curls. Overall it's a must have. Def a buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shell Gr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rubbish! Don’t waste your money it doesn’t heat up well. Wouldn’t even make a decent curl in my hair, not even when a professional was testing it out on me. His advice to me was “oh honey you were robbed throw that useless thing away” waste of my money I tell you.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty's Bear

customer_reviews.title: This is a good deal.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good curling wand. It comes with a glove that really helps when it comes to the heat while holding the end of my hair. I have to let the wand stay longer because I have natural thick curly hair. I personally prefer to just use my flat iron to make my curls, but this does work. Overall for the price and value this is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: April Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Curling iron
customer_reviews.text: Really bad The Heat resistance not good. I accidentally touch with my finger While I'm curling my hair last time burnt my skin so quick. I bought this because I saw on youtube I watch the video and had a link of amazon. Its cheap And I add to cart and order it . I am so excited to try but the curl of my hair not last and its not really curly just a wave and not really good at all. I bought this with set of Hair spray thickening the hair spray smells good and it works only the curling iron NOT RECOMMENDED NOT SAFE
customer_reviews.author: Xhaome

customer_reviews.title: Great curls - lasts for days, seriously!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how long my curls have lasted and my hair is like a long bob, or close to semi-medium length hair at this point. This curling iron is the best curling iron I've ever had the opportunity of using and I'm so glad I decided to invest in it. I had to research "best affordable curling wands" and one of my favorite short hair YouTubers came back onto YouTube and reviewed it. I'm pretty happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Moreno

customer_reviews.title: It heats up really fast.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!!!! I’ve been looking for a curling wand that curls my hair fast since I have thick hair and usually takes forever to style but with this wand it took about 15 minutes, each curl took 10 seconds or less. I curled my hair at 8:00am and the picture was taken at 3:00pm. Usually when I use another iron I have to put a lot of hairspray in my hair & I don’t know what it is with this one but my curls stay bouncy without them being stiff. Really recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jailene

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable
customer_reviews.text: I curled my hair and 20 min later it was completely flat. I went to return it and it's not returnable! I feel like that should be advertised a bit bigger or maybe I just shouldn't assume everything is returnable. Now I'm stuck with me.
customer_reviews.author: LibbyHiner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this wand for years and it’s amazing! You do not need to hold It onto your hair for longer then 10 seconds. It comes with the glove, most reviews said it didn’t, but it does. Really great product. I love it ! I got the 0.5-1 inch size which is my favorite for curls that can expand once left in hair the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Marz Léon

customer_reviews.title: and so far so good! I have yet to burn myself and after ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a curling wand or iron before, I normally use a straightener to curl my hair. I decided to give this a try after seeing it in several articles, and so far so good! I have yet to burn myself and after watching a couple of tutorials I was able to use the wand with relative ease. Now, my curls did not come out perfect the first few times using it, but I blame myself and not the product, as it is a new product I am using. I am finally getting it narrowed down after about two weeks of usage, and have gotten compliments on the curls/waves this produces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, not great.
customer_reviews.text: The barrel of the curling wand is slightly textures instead of smooth so the curls don't slide off as easy. The good part about that is the hair stays in place while it's curling, the bad is that it's harder to get the hair off nicely. It feels very light weight and kind of cheap. First use smells really chemically. Honestly, the Conair one is much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!! NO TETURN ON THIS YERRIBLT DESIGNED CURLING IRON!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd give one zero if I could! Fell for all of the fake reviews, and now I receive it, and it's a terrible design! No way to curl your hair without using your hand to hold it in place. They send a flimsy winter type glove to use, but curling iron burns your hand right through it! My mistake for not seeing there were no returns (as far as I'm concerned, that should be written in big bold letters on the ad, but it isn't!), but it doesn't have to be your mistake! Beware!!! Stay away from this junky, terribly designed curling iron!!
customer_reviews.author: Coby

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy effortless Curls!
customer_reviews.text: Recently went to a concert and m gf had to come over to get ready. She has two little ones so getting ready at her house would have meant she would be late...lol She LOVED this wand. She asked where I got it, how much I paid, and why I'd been holding out on her by not telling her I had something like this. Her curls came out effortlessly, and it took her all of 15 mins, so she was really impressed as she has little time to do her own hair nowadays.
customer_reviews.author: Zee Frasier

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to use, and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I actually hate this product. It gets hot very quickly, but it’s quite difficult to wrap hairs around it. In the demo video they typically show you only one section. But try doing for all hairs on your head! It comes with a protective glove, which is rather useless. I cannot even return this product to amazon.com. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: M. Onishi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING PRODUCT!!! this was my first time using this and I LOVE IT!! I will be getting the bigger barrel when my hair grows longer but this was SOOOOOOOOOOOO worth the buy! and its so easy to use and I have VERY VERY fine hair and its 3:30 in the afternoon and my hair is still holding a curl from 6:30 am! and that's with a rushed morning and not alot of product or effort! AND my hair has a lot of bounce to it. I'm saying goodbye to flat irons b/c of this amazing wand! and look at the statistics this thing is almost 5 star out of close to 5k reviews! amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Beauty L.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: My hair curls super well and always holds until this guys lol! Love the curl hate the hold they all fell out with in 40 minutes to an hour. Not just on myself but my boudoir clients as wellZ it was a quick buy when mine broke however i will be going back to my good more expensive wand. I personally would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite curling wand ever!
customer_reviews.text: my hair is super difficult to curl! Its very fine and very thin. I've tried curling irons with the clamps, I've tried the hair straightener trick and my hair does not hold. This wand is amazing!! It makes my curls so pretty and it actually holds!! I also like that I can put it on its hottest setting and I don't have to worry about it burning my hair since its ceramic and not metal. 10 out of 10 would totally recommend! I love that it comes with the glove too.
customer_reviews.author: Ryfender13

customer_reviews.title: Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: My hair is longer, and is baby fine and thin. I can pay a pretty penny to the hairdresser for curls and they will fall out within a few short hours. This is the ONLY curling wand to keep a curl in my hair, even through to the next day. I am in love with it. The barrel is slick and I had never used a curling wand before, so it took me a few tries and one small burn to my neck (reminded me of my high school days...lol) to get the hang of it. Now, I have no issues using it and I don't use the included glove.
customer_reviews.author: PositiveSerendipity

customer_reviews.title: Works Miracles!
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended a wand to curl my hair from my stylist and I saw that this Remington model had very good reviews. I have NEVER been able to curl my hair right and have it look flawless. This wand is amazing! I curled my hair in less than 10 minutes, and it lasted for 2 full days, no kidding! I started by using the glove that came with it, but it got in the way more so I took it off and was just careful. Love, love this product and will recommend to any of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: K. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Want to return
customer_reviews.text: The temperature control switches were on the handle. As I was holding or twirling the wand it would move the temperature up and up. Not safe!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ellis

customer_reviews.title: A perfect curler that won't burn or damage your hair!
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect curler for those whose hair is medium length or long. Wouldn't really recommend for very short hair. It gives effortless, romantic kind of beach curls/waves. Very easy to use and you can control the temperature very easily-this is very important to me since my hair is very thin and I don't need the temp to be super hot in order to get the curls I want. This way you don't burn your hair. I have had a Remington hair straightener for ten years and I really love the durability of this brand. this is why I chose remington curler as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mersiha

customer_reviews.title: Miracle wand for long, straight, stubborn hair!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I have verrry stick straight and pretty thick Filipino hair. And long!! Almost down to my butt. I’ve been going through wand after wand trying to find one that actually works for me. I’ve finally found this one and I’m sooo happy with it!!! It heats up very quickly to 410, which is great because my super straight hair needs that heat. I love that you can adjust the temp too. I honestly didn’t think my hair could get as curly as it does using this wand! And I’ll still have a ton of curls in the next day. I feel like if it can work on my stubborn hair, it can work on anyone’s!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this wand!!
customer_reviews.text: My hair never holds a curl, but this thing is magic. It takes some getting used to and I’ve managed to rip out a lot of hair in the process, but I think that’s a me problem. Lol The pic is my second time using it and you can get really different curls depending on how you do it. They stayed put for the whole day and fell to loose beach waves, but still looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great curling wand
customer_reviews.text: I love this wand. It creates a great curl and seems to make curls hold longer then other curling wands do.i always use it on the highest heat though because the lower settings don’t seem to make the curls last as long. My hair is really long so I need to buy a bigger one but this one is still great.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize this doesn’t come with the clip the hold the hair in. I tried to return it and nope... not aloud. So I tried it and within seconds burned my hand even when trying the glove. Darn. So it’s in my donation bag. Maybe someone else will be luckier with it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: As a girl who doesn’t know how to use a curling iron, this was definitely a must. Super easy to use. Comes with heat resistant glove. I wouldn’t full handed grab the iron with the glove but it definitely protects your fingers. Works perfectly on my thin hair and my best friends thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: I like the curls it provides and think it works about as well as I expected. I have the smaller one in this style and love it as well. I have naturally curly hair and need something to spruce up those curls that just do not cooperate and bought this for those curls I did not want as tight as the curls my other iron provides. My curls last a right good while with these with hairspray, except for some but I think that is just my hair. Overall, I would recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a curler like this for what feels like forever. Super easy to use, especially if you are good with a want (and if you aren't, YouTube it!) Heats up nice and evenly. Includes a glove so you don't burn your fingertips! Gives me the big curls or nice waves I've been dying for. Photos posted from when I used curler to just give waves, if you want bigger curls use less hair and twist the hair before twisting it around the wand!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Frye

customer_reviews.title: It’s challenging to use
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my hair is too short (shoulder length) but I can’t get it to wrap around the barrel without a clip to hold while wrapping. I use the glove but I find it awkward and uncomfortable. I also use opposite hands when I change sides to curl and changing gloves is an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Thistle Sailor

customer_reviews.title: I use this almost every day
customer_reviews.text: I love how fast it is to get a nice wave in my hair with this wand. Super hassle free. Took me a few tries to get good enough to not wear the safety glove with it. And also I may have burned my ear once. :) There is a slight learning curve. I'm really happy with this one though and have no appetite for more curlers, wands etc, this is all I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Choo

customer_reviews.title: A Unique Curling Iron
customer_reviews.text: I'm only rating this 3 stars simply because I haven't grasped the concept of having to wear a glove on one hand and wind my hair around the curling iron. I would prefer the clamp on the curling iron that holds the hair in place as it is rolled towards the scalp. I will keep trying to master this and maybe it's not a challenge for most, but with arthritis in both hands and shoulders, maybe not the best choice as it takes me longer to curl my hair.
customer_reviews.author: L. P. Zuber

customer_reviews.title: Gloves not heat resistance
customer_reviews.text: The gloves weren’t heat resistance. They felt like regular knitted gloves, disappointing. The curling wand was very easy to use and handle. Temperature control was fairly simple to adjust. The wand curls my hair wonderfully, it was just the gloves that knocks off a star. I’ve used better heat resistant gloves than the one that came in this package.
customer_reviews.author: N.T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I got the bigger barrel and it is great for natural curls that aren't too much on the ringlet side. Heats up very quickly, makes perfect curls that last even without spray or any other product. Only issue is the hair has a tendency to slide off because of the slanted tip. Still, I love it for the price and quality. It would also make a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: Light wand found on a fashion blogger’s page
customer_reviews.text: I found this curled on a blog and decided to get it because the blogger had beautiful curls from this wand. I don’t think I have the patience or skills to curl my hair. I do like how light this item is so it doesn’t add too much weight in my carry on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept slipping off my hair and burning me
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I wanted to love this product. It looked idiot-proof, which is a must for me because I'm not great with my hair. The curls that held look great, but half the time my hair slipped right off the barrel and it would swing into my ears, neck, or even my face (my forehead is missing a nice patch of skin now and I have 2 burns that look like hickeys on my neck). My hair isn't that fine, but try as I might it just did not stay on the curler. I went to return it, and apparently this item is ineligible for return, so now I'm stuck with it and less than pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: Love hate
customer_reviews.text: I'm in a love hate relationship. It's very hard to maneuver, and you're inevitably going to burn your fingers. The glove is impossible to use (it only comes with one glove so you're constantly switching hands). I love the curls, but honestly it's just easier using my straightener. Hopefully it'll get better with time.
customer_reviews.author: Khristian

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely long thick hair. My hair does not hold a curl unless I use product and after it is curled I have to pin the curls up until my hair is cooled. Using a regular curling Iron it usually takes a minimum of an hour. I used this on the highest temp and my hair stayed curled for two days! I did not use any product and it only took me 20 minutes to do my whole head. I am in love with this!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah lee

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the good reviews. But the cone shaped barrel is a nightmare! My hair constantly slid down the barrel and I'd burn my fingers trying to wrestle my hair back up the barrel. The glove made my hair staticky, so I went without. I got fed up with burning my fingers and ordered a new curling wand with a straight extra long barrel. Much better!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value --- still works after 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: I love this curling wand! I've used it over 2 1/2 years now on very long hair and it was perfect. I just chopped over 9 inches off and it was still perfect for the new style. 2 years of regular curling and it still works like day one! Such a bargain, no need for the fancy high-dollar name brands!
customer_reviews.author: Denise D.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a couple months
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this curling iron (especially for the price). I used it sporadically, maybe 3-4 times per week. It would heat up quickly and make nice waves in my mid-length hair. A couple of weeks ago I was using it and it made a loud pop and a spark came out of the barrel where it meets the handle. I thought it wa strange but I kept using it. A couple days after this incident it completely stopped working. Wouldn’t turn on at all. I am really disappointed but I don’t feel that bad because I didn’t spend that much on it. I wish it would have lasted half a year at least.
customer_reviews.author: M. Boswell

customer_reviews.title: You can't wrap and slide the hair down like I am used to doing
customer_reviews.text: Could not get this to work. The cone shaped design makes it impossible to wrap my hair around it correctly. You can't wrap and slide the hair down like I am used to doing. I've learned to love using my regular curling iron as a curling wand - works much better than this.
customer_reviews.author: real food. home made.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I don't use curlers but I decided to try this for fun. Absolutely love it! Granted, I have no idea what I'm doing and I didn't use any products. So far, no complaints and I'm now going to buy the smaller one as well!
customer_reviews.author: Team Rose

customer_reviews.title: so happy I trusted the reviews and bought this curling wand
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, so happy I trusted the reviews and bought this curling wand. I wanted bigger curls than my Remington 1/2" to 1" wand was making, now that my hair is longer and this is doing exactly what I hoped it would. Like the digital temperature display, the 60 minute auto shut off feature, and the 30 second heat up feature (also comes with a full-size heat-protective glove). Definitely would recommend this to anyone wanting a new curling wand!
customer_reviews.author: Sta So

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, like my Lange WAY BETTER!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a big fan of this wand compared to the Lange curling wands. I don’t like how this one gets smaller. I like the same size diameter and overall it feels like cheaper quality than the Lange wands. My hair also kept getting stuck in the part where the rod meets the handle. I’d rather spend the extra money on a Lange curling wand that has better results!
customer_reviews.author: Kay14

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few years ago, and there's nothing that compares to this. I've used curling irons, but this is the only tool that actually holds my curls (I have thick hair). It's very easy to use, and gives me beautiful beach waves. I absolutely love this, and recommend it to everyone I know!
customer_reviews.author: R Dizzle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! LOVE! LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! LOVE this wand!! I rarely ever do my hair but I heard such great things, I had to try it! Gave me these really beautiful, beachy type waves. It's almost 24 hrs later and my hair still looks great! I also love that it came with a full glove. I bought my daughter a smaller wand a few months ago and it was only a partial glove, which I didn't like. So excited about using this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I purchased the larger 1 - 1.5" as I have longer hair and wanted more "wave curls" than "curly curls". My hair is thick and frizzy wavy. This is just the ticket. Adjustable heat so I can turn it up if I want more curls, or less heat to just tame the frizz and add a little structure to the madness. The glove also works GREAT - it fits my hand like, well, a glove and protects from the heat in the event of accidental touching while styling. Also, I think it damages the hair less than a curling iron, and there's less friction and tugging and pulling. 5 stars from this mommy of two toddlers :)
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: After opening the box up, I immediately knew I made a mistake buying this wand. Just from holding it you can tell how cheaply made it is. When I heated it up I was scared something would break or the cheap plastic would melt (it did not). My hair did not hold a curl with this wand either, even with the temperature at 300. I have a thinner curling wands I've been using for 8 year, so I know technique or heat were not the problem. Sadly this item is not returnable, so I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Take forever
customer_reviews.text: My hair is naturally frizzy curly. I have to straighten with a flat iron first. Then curl with this. Then it looks bad the next day. Might as well curl with the flat iron in one step. If u have straight hair naturally, this will work for u. Also, I feel like I have to hold it on my hair for a really long time. My hair is thick and course. I just don't have the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ya boi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty waves/loose curls
customer_reviews.text: I got the 1-1 1/2 barrel because curling my hair with a flat iron is a bit of a pain. This is definitely easier, but I do feel like I have to hold the hair longer for the curl to take compared to my chi flat iron. The curls were definitely looser which made for pretty beach waves. If you are looking for anything curlier go with the smaller barrel.
customer_reviews.author: smeli18

customer_reviews.title: After 6 years it’s still works good
customer_reviews.text: It’s funny because I just seen this now after 6 years! It still works pretty good and still goes by temperature! I bought this when I was in middle school now I’m graduating lol! I love this product! But I notice it gives a burn smell now, and it started like 2 years ago
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Aquino

customer_reviews.title: You do NOT need to spend more on a curling wand!
customer_reviews.text: I love this curling wand! It's tapered just right, so it's easy to make loose, beachy curls. The heat settings are really nice because there is so much versatility. I would just recommend a different glove than the one it comes with; it doesn't quite insulate from heat as well as I would like. But the wand itself is just amazing and really proves you don't need to spend a whole bunch of money to have salon-like hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine hair!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this curler! Showed pics right after done & after I combed them out. Curls have literally lasted days. The glove is an awesome bonus, I'm terrible with burning myself. I have super fine thin hair, & this wand definitely brought life back to my hair, usually other curlers will only hold a curl in my hair a few hours at most!
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Dawn Ramey

customer_reviews.title: not very good
customer_reviews.text: Nothing compares to a real big barrel curling iron. That wand might be easier to use, but the results are not comparable. The curls with the wand are not very defined and you have to leave it on for quite a long time, which may damage hair more.... the temp of 410 degrees doesn't seem to be enough... even if i left it on for 20 sec. or more the curls were too lose, and seem they would not hold... i redid my whole head with my curling iron... faster and safer, and voila.... the real Victorias secret look....with babyliss curling iron....just returning this wand...
customer_reviews.author: forgues chantal

customer_reviews.title: Great wand
customer_reviews.text: This is my first wand and I think it's really great. I like looser curls so this 1-1.5" size was perfect for me. My hair sometimes snags a little on the barrel, where the metal wand and handle meet, which is the only reason why I'm giving a a 4 out of 5. This product came with a heat resistance glove, which I don't use.
customer_reviews.author: Rosio Catomerisios

product_meta.title: Remington CI9538 Pro 1"-1.5" Pearl Ceramic Conical Curling Wand, Digital Controls + 10 Heat Settings, Black/Pink
product_meta.description: Size:1 - 1.5 InchThe REMINGTON Pro 1" - 1½" Pearl Ceramic Conical Curling Wand features Professional Pearl Ceramic - ceramic infused with real crushed pearls creates fast, salon results with less damage. The ceramic provides even, consistent heat while styling, and the crushed pearl helps create smooth, frizz defying waves. The wide conical barrel (1”-1½”) creates beautiful tousled waves. Digital controls and ten heat settings (max 410°F) make it easy to select the right temperature for your hair. The temperature lock function allows you to lock the styler at your preferred temperature during styling. A heat protective glove has been included.
feature_bullets: 1inch 1½ inch Wide Conical Barrel Creates Tousled Waves
Professional Pearl Ceramic for Less Damage and Faster Salon Results
Ceramic Coating for Even, Consistent Heat
Crushed Pearl Infused Barrel for Smooth, Lustrous Waves
